story.text: Jan 3 The following are the 20 top-selling vehicles in the United States through December of 2006 as reported by the automakers. Following is a list of the top-20 selling vehicles, ranked by total units. RANK VEHICLE 2006 2005 '05 RANK % Chng 1 Ford F-Series pickup 796,039 901,463 1 -11.7 2 Chevy Silverado-C/K pickup 636,069 705,980 2 -9.9 3 Toyota Camry 448,445 431,703 3 +3.9 4 Toyota Corolla 387,388 341,290 6 +13.5 5 Dodge Ram P/U (pickup) 364,177 400,543 4 -9.1 6 Honda Accord 354,441 369,293 5 -4.0 7 Honda Civic 316,638 308,415 7 +2.7 8 Chevrolet Impala 289,868 246,481 13 +17.6 9 Nissan Altima 232,457 255,371 9 -9.0 10 Chevrolet Cobalt 211,449 212,667 15 -0.6 11 Dodge Caravan 211,140 226,771 12 -6.9 12 GMC Sierra pickup 210,736 229,488 10 -8.2 13 Ford Econoline/Club Wagon 180,457 179,543 21 +0.5 14 Ford Explorer 179,229 239,788 8 -25.3 15 Honda Odyssey 177,919 174,275 20 +2.1 16 Ford Focus 177,006 184,825 17 -4.2 17 Ford Taurus 174,803 196,919 16 -11.2 18 Chevrolet TrailBlazer 174,797 244,150 11 -28.4 19 CR-V 170,028 150,219 n/a +13.2 20 Ford Mustang 166,530 160,975 24 +3.5 ---------------------------------------------------------------
story.title: top - 20 selling vehicles in u . s . through december
